sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>spicy</radical> radical and <kanji>spicy</kanji> kanji are exactly the same! Hot!
readingMnemonic: Imagine eating this <kanji>spicy</kanji> food, becoming blinded by the spicy heat, and knocking your <reading>shin</reading> (<ja>しん</ja>) on something while you bumble around.
readingInfo: It's bleeding profusely and really hurts a lot. Plus your mouth is still burning from that spicy food you ate. It's pure agony.
